content.raw: I think it would be a good idea to always start by appending `~pre1` when we bump to X.0.0
content.html: I think it would be a good idea to always start by appending ~pre1 when we bump to X.0.0

update.description:
** Updated version to 10 in 5202fb4**

* Remove a couple of error messages

* Fix parsing URDF without <material> inside <gazebo>

* [Blueprint] Unversioned lib name for cmds

* Close branch cmd_lib_name_8

* Close branch urdf_empty_material

* Bump to 8.6.1

* Close branch bump_8.6.1

* Added tag sdformat8_8.6.1 for changeset 28f2163a94d4

* Allow static models without links, and skip loading FrameAttachedToGraph for static models for now until we can update its implementation

* root_multiple_models.sdf: remove a model's links but make it static

* changelog and migration guide

* Close branch allow_static_models_without_links

* bump to 9.0.0~pre4

* Close branch bump9_pre4

* Added tag sdformat9_9.0.0~pre4 for changeset 1379ccbf19ab

* Add clipping for depth camera on rgbd camera sensor

* Remove extra whitespace

* Update depth clip sdf description

* Add depth clip tests

* Update depth set function

* Correct depth setter

* Reduce depth min to 0.1

* Close branch not_an_error

* reword check

* Update with setters + getters for near/far clip and depth camera

* Add const to getters

* Format fixes

* Close branch 8_to_9

* Prepare 9.0.0 release

* Remove pre4 suffix for 9.0.0

* Remove typo

* Added tag sdformat9_9.0.0 for changeset 1a3f95acdc3c

* Add tests and setting for has clip

* Fix link pose multiplication for URDF

* Close branch urdf_pose_mult

* Migration.md edited online with Bitbucket

* Lint parse_urdf

* Backport URDF multiplication and linter

* Close branch lint_parse_urdf

* Reduce redundant value setting

* Remove clip req for depth camera

* Close branch add_depth_clip

* Close branch backport_urdf_stuff

* Bump to 8.7.0

* Close branch bump_8.7.0

* 8.7.0

* Added tag sdformat8_8.7.0 for changeset a9dd4dc9fe68

* Add example world file with world as child link of a joint and confirm that ign sdf --check complains

* Add INTEGRATION_joint_dom tests for successfully loading joint_parent_world and unsuccessfully loading joint_child_world and joint_invalid_child

* changelog

* joint_child_world.sdf: fix model name

* fix test

* Close branch merge89_depth_clip

* update migration guide and specification

* sdf 1.7: remove //world/joint element since it has never been used

* Joint::Load: add explicit check for child link != world

* fix UNIT_ign_TEST

* converter: Fix memory leak pointed out by ASan

* Changelog.md edited online with Bitbucket

* Close branch joint_world_child

* Provide ign math shape information

* Changelog

* Close branch rm_world_joint

* test non-const Shape() functions

* Close branch math_shapes
update.title: Sdf9 to default 20200110
